name: Wiimms Mario Kart Fun 2017-05
overview: Wiimms Mario Kart Fun 2017-05, the successor of Wiimms Mario Kart Fun 2016-10, is a Custom Track Distribution made by Wiimm with much help from Leseratte. It contains almost all tracks of its predecessor with some updated and some new tracks. It has been released as ISO Patcher. This ISO Patcher can also create a Riivolution setup.
